::Zardus/EndBringer/Killfest::

Zardus spins and flies up, but is still hit by alot of rapid fire
shots. He growls, but sees that most of the bots were moving steadily
backwards. At last this battle was over.

"Alliance members, concentrate firepower on the retreating bots. We're
getting out of here in a few minutes," he says into his comm, firing
twenty shots at Tofu (er, Tufu, wait, no, Teufa, no wait! Teufel! Yup,
that's it, Teufel!). He sees Nemesis Enforcer on the ground, and
lands, picking up the downed bot and flying back up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The acid hit EndBringer in one of his tentacles, though he blocked the
rest of it with his arm. His other three tentacles wrap around
Injector, sending millions of volts of electricity through him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest flies up and avoids the shockwave, then returns fire with two
missiles.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Airly, Demon Wulf, Flesh Ripper and D. Claw are all one big bot
currently, 
> Dark Wolf.  So I'll take it your two missiles are heading for Dark
Wolf, and 
> just for reference he's 25ft in height.  And sorry for any
confusion, I meant 
> that Serpentor had been hit from behind and was heading towards the
CF, not 
> Scattershot.  Little bit of a typo on my part...)
> 
> 
> The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Dark Wolf/Nemesis
Enforcer/Scattershot/ 
> Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/  
> Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/ Sun Crusher/Reflector/ 
> Smokescreen/Serpentor/Sixshot/Ares:
> 
> 
> 
> Two missiles streaked through the air and struck Dark Wolf in the
chest plate 
> and the gestalts frame shook in result.  He let out a painful growl
and 
> raised an arm.  From the palm fired a black orb with the power of a
charge 
> and it shot out at the CF.
> 
> In response to the gnat that was bothering him, he fired a single
optic blast 
> at Shivah.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark One was almost finished with Pyro and turned his attention to
Dragonfly. 
>  "What?  You're a Predacon?  And you're attacking us?  How stupid
are you!?"
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown lowered his weapon and turned away from Dragonfly and bent
down 
> near Pyro.  "Need any help?" he asked Dark One.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro, Hiss, and Scavenger remained unconsciouss, though Pyro was
almost up 
> and atom.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hot Spot remained unconsciouss while First Aid struggled to get to
his feet.
> 
> Streetwise and Groove on the other hand were being carried away.
> 
> ---
> 
> Blades fired off another twenty highly explosive rounds, this time
at Dark 
> Wolf's left arm.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot gave a look of disbelief and still had his rifle trained
on 
> Dragonfly, aiming at her head.  "Oh, now when you're losing the
battle you 
> claim to be Alliance allies?  IS THAT YOU'RE SICK GAME?!" the
mentally ill 
> robot yelled.
> 
> ---
> 
> Imprisoner cursed and armed his weapons once more.  He fired a
missile to 
> take out two missiles heading for Choran.  He then fired a missile
at the 
> Element.  His weapons changed, and the cannons fired a large sphere
shaped 
> blasts of laser energy at the Cybertronian Fire, due to a
soon-to-occur 
> shortage of missiles.
> 
> ---
> 
> Predator transformed into his jaguar mode and leapt, the resulting
explosion 
> sending him clear of other enemy fire.  He landed on his legs with a
singed 
> behind and transformed back to biped mode.
> 
> He raised his launcher, firing off two rockets.  One at Darkfate and
the 
> other at Forrior.
> The bounty hunter fired two optic blasts off at Truttle as well,
wanting to 
> take as many people down as possible.
> 
> An internal beep alerted Predator of something.  "The ship!  The
blessed ship 
> is coming!  Bless my spark!"
> 
> ---
> 
> Choran asked himself a question.  Why him?  There were stronger
'bots out 
> there, why pick on him?  Of course, he answered his own question as
he jumped 
> like hell, thirty-five shots digging into the ground behind him. 
"You people 
> are insane!  GO SHOOT A GESTALT!  WHAT THE SLAG IS YOUR PROBLEM!?"
he raised 
> his rifle, firing it in an arc.  Five shots at Zardus, five at
Rixer, five at 
> Forrior, and ten at Luzbel.
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave avoided the two shells and saw that Incarcinator was being
majorly 
> attacked.  Excellent, he thought.
> 
> Transforming to his ray gun once more, about the same size as his in
biped 
> mode, he fired a blast of x-ray energy at Incarcinator in a circle
with a 
> diameter of thirty feet, Incarcinator in the center as it shot out.
> 
> The Neo Decepticon Emperor reverted back to biped mode feeling a
little 
> drained.  So he raised his missile launcher and took aim, not
wanting to 
> expend to much energy.
> 
> ---
> 
> Firestarter avoided the missiles and most of the shots, some digging
into his 
> frame.  The shots that had missed headed for the Cybertronian Fire,
that 
> being a little less than two dozen laser blasts and two missiles
from Maximal 
> friendly fire.
> 
> He fired two missiles at the Cybertronian Fire and ten rapid laser
blasts at 
> that same ship, then transformed to biped mode, missile launcher in
hand.
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron raised his shield to deflect DrillBit's rounds and flew to
the side 
> of other shots, letting them pass by harmlessly.  He raised his
rifle, firing 
> off two blasts of laser energy at DrillBit and two emerald optic
blasts at 
> Dollon's left shoulder.
> 
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch didn't see any shots coming from the cloaked enemy, but
Beeline 
> spotted an enemy coming in close from behind.  He changed the angle
of his 
> tail and fired off a blast of green acid at EndBringer's incoming
tentacles,  
> and the rest heading for his face and chest plate in a large amount.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector was struck by a charge as he flew hard left to avoid two
missiles, 
> and the rest of the shots missed as he nearly hit the ground with a
gaping 
> hole in his side.  He raised his weapons, firing off a total of four
stinger 
> missiles.  Two at Atilla the other two at Alecto.
> 
> Manterror's body was riddled with leaking holes from the thirty
shots he 
> hadn't been able to get out of the way of.  He fired off six ion
disks, three 
> at Atilla and the other three at Manthys.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement raised his right arm, firing off two missiles that
prematurely 
> exploded and took out all the shots that took out all weapon fire
heading for 
> Unicron.  But this act had a price, as a missile (the other taken
out by 
> Beeline) streaked through the air, blowing up against his arm that
he managed 
> to raise, ripping the bottom part of his hand up pretty bad as he
flew back 
> from the explosion.  Five shots from Darkfate dug into his armor
painfully.
> 
> He cursed, raising his undamaged arm and fired a sonic wave off at
Killfest.
> 
> ---
> 
> With Smokescreen nicely beaten, Sun Crusher got up and raised
Smokescreen's 
> heavy laser rifle that was now property of the Brotherhood.
> 
> He cocked it, and fired off a blast Zardus.  Raising his other arm
he fired 
> off two spheres of laser energy.  One at Darkfate, the other at
Rixer.
> 
> ---
> (Reflector is 300 ft in the air, Airly, in case you didn't know)
> 
> Reflector jumped back from Luzbel's sword slash, the incoming
missiles from 
> Rixer intercepted by Beeline and only two of the plasma shots dug
into 
> Reflector's side.
> 
> "Cursed heathens..." he raised an arm, firing off two missiles, one
seeking 
> and one non at Luzbel.  He raised his other arm, the cannon firing
off four 
> spherical blasts of laser energy.  Two at Rixer, two at one of
Rixer's 
> bee-bots.
> 
> ---
> 
> Serpentor no longer felt pressure on him, but he was on a collision
course 
> with the Cybertronian Fire, and there was nothing he could do except
for the 
> impact. He struck the shields, and a mass amount of enemy surged
through him 
> and he let out painful screams, the shields keeping him up in the
air, a 
> fourth of his systems already blowing out and the other fourth about
to give 
> away as well.
> 
> ---
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer landed to the ground and collapsed to his knees,
one hand 
> holding him up.  He spit up some mech-fluid and spoke painfully. 
"Take 
> that...you slag...sucking...reptile..." and with that he collapsed,
going 
> into stasis lock.
> 
> ---
> 
> The cockpit of the incoming space fighter opened and out hopped
Ares, who 
> transformed from biped mode into his jet fighter mode and took off,
firing 
> off twenty-five rapid laser blasts at Rixer.
> 
> Sixshot armed his weapons and launched two missiles off at the
Element, 
> followed up by 25 rapid laser blasts at the newest Maximal base.
